p: Evolutionary distances were calculated using MEGA version 4 using the Maximum Composite Likelihood method [ 36]. Codon positions included were the 1st + 2nd + 3rd + noncoding. All positions containing gaps and missing data were eliminated from the dataset (complete deletion option). Estimates of s.e. were obtained by a bootstrap procedure of 1000 replicates. Analysis of evolutionary selection profile was performed using Datamonkey http://www.datamonkey.org/ following the Fixed- Effect Likelihood (FEL) method [Hasegawa, Kishino and Yano (HKY) model, p-value less than 0.05] [ 38, 39].
